scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy open-format/local --ipfs http://0.0.0.0:5001 --node http://0.0.0.0:8020 subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.deploy-alchemy:arbitrum-sepolia: dotenv cross-var -- graph deploy open-format-timestamp-to-block-number --version-label %ALCHEMY_SUBGRAPH_VERSION_ARBITRUM_SEPOLIA% --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key %ALCHEMY_DEPLOY_KEY% --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz subgraph.arbitrum-sepolia.yaml
